ABOUT.TITLE: ABOUT
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION1: I'm a frontend developer with a Master's degree in Computer Science from the University of Mostar. Since 2023, I've been working at an IT company where I build and maintain web and mobile applications using React and React Native.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION2: Through hands-on project experience, I've developed a solid understanding of UI/UX, responsive design, and performance optimization. I enjoy turning ideas into practical, well-designed interfaces and take pride in writing clean, efficient code that's easy to maintain.

EDUCATION.TITLE: EDUCATION & CAREER
EDUCATION.BACHELOR: Bachelor of Computer Science, Faculty of Natural Sciences, Mathematics and Education at Mostar
EDUCATION.MASTER: Master of Computer Science, Faculty of Natural Sciences, Mathematics and Education at Mostar
